mapper.select: select id, password from user where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
select sum(watt)/1000 as result from data where reg_date between timestamp(#{startDate}) and timestamp(#{endDate})

select title, sum(watt) as watt, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H') as reg_string_date from data where reg_date between FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startLongDate}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endLongDate}) group by date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H') order by reg_date
select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%m') mm , avg(watt) watt from data where reg_date >= '2018-01-01'and reg_date < '2019-01-01' group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%m')
select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%m') mm , avg(watt) watt from data where reg_date >= '2018-05-01'and reg_date < '2018-06-01' group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%m')
select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%m') mm , avg(watt) watt from data where reg_date >= '2018-04-01'and reg_date < '2018-05-01' group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%m')
select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%d') dd , avg(watt) watt from data where reg_date >= '2018-04-01'and reg_date < '2018-05-01' group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%d')
select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%d') dd , avg(watt) watt from data where reg_date = '2018-04-30' group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%d')
